caption.p: Trend of EBOV-specific antibody response and viremia in relation to DSO. IgM ( a), IgG ( b) titres and viral load ( c) detected in survivor patients. IgM ( d), IgG ( e) titres and viral load ( f) detected in fatal cases. Data are shown as median and interquartile range values of antibody titres (expressed as reciprocal of plasma dilution) and viral load (expressed as Log cp RNA/mL). Dotted-lines represent the limits of detection of IFA (1:20, in a, b, d and e) and viral load (3.11 Log cp RNA/mL, in c and f). DSO = days since symptoms onset; N = number of samples tested for each time-point.
